# [Interview #506: JordanCon 2010 Q&A Report - Terez, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=506#12)

#### Linda

Who thought up the mindtrap? Any circumstances you can divulge...?

#### Harriet McDougal Rigney

I don't remember.

#### Brandon Sanderson

MAFO.

#### [Maria Simons](http://www.dragonmount.com/index.php/News/amol/answers-to-a-few-mafo-questions-r658)

I know nothing.
